words.source: H3205 (יָלַד, qal wayyiqtol 3fs) with conjunctive waw; KJV 'bare', ESV 'gave birth to', NASB 'gave birth to'
H1121 (בֵּן, noun common masculine singular absolute); KJV/ESV/NASB 'a son'
H7121 (קָרָא, qal wayyiqtol 3ms) with conjunctive waw; KJV 'called', ESV 'called', NASB 'named'
H853 (אֵת, direct object marker); untranslated in English
H8034 (שֵׁם, noun common masculine singular construct + 3ms suffix); KJV/ESV/NASB 'his name'
H1647 (גֵּרְשֹׁם, proper noun); from גֵּר 'sojourner'; KJV/ESV/NASB 'Gershom'
H559 (אָמַר, qal perfect 3ms); KJV 'he said', ESV 'he said', NASB 'he said'
H1616 (גֵּר, noun common masculine singular absolute); KJV 'a stranger', ESV 'a sojourner', NASB 'a sojourner'
H1961 (הָיָה, qal perfect 1cs); KJV 'I have been', ESV 'I have been', NASB 'I have been'
H776 (אֶרֶץ, noun common feminine singular absolute) with preposition beth; KJV/ESV/NASB 'in a foreign land'
H5237 (נָכְרִי, adjective feminine singular absolute); KJV 'a strange land', ESV 'a foreign land', NASB 'a foreign land'
